abstract: Illinois Comptroller Leslie Munger says state will delay November payment of $560 million to pension funds and may delay or reduce December payment, blaming budget impasse in Legislature.
lead_paragraph: Illinois will have to delay a November payment of $560 million to pension funds, and may also delay or reduce a similar payment in December.

headline.main: Illinois: Amid Fight Over Budget, State Will Delay Pension Payment
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Amid Fight Over Budget, State Will Delay Pension Payment

snippet: Illinois will have to delay a November payment of $560 million to pension funds, and may also delay or reduce a similar payment in December.
